11#include "modules/audio_mixer/audio_mixer_impl.h"

20#include "modules/audio_mixer/audio_frame_manipulator.h"

26namespace webrtc {
27
28struct AudioMixerImpl::SourceStatus {
29 SourceStatus(Source* audio_source, bool is_mixed, float gain)
30 : audio_source(audio_source), is_mixed(is_mixed), gain(gain) {}
31 Source* audio_source = nullptr;
32 bool is_mixed = false;
33 float gain = 0.0f;
34
35 // A frame that will be passed to audio_source->GetAudioFrameWithInfo.
36 AudioFrame audio_frame;
37};
38
39namespace {
40
41struct SourceFrame {
42 SourceFrame() = default;
43
44 SourceFrame(AudioMixerImpl::SourceStatus* source_status,
45 AudioFrame* audio_frame,
46 bool muted)
47 : source_status(source_status), audio_frame(audio_frame), muted(muted) {
48 RTC_DCHECK(source_status);
49 RTC_DCHECK(audio_frame);
50 if (!muted) {
51 energy = AudioMixerCalculateEnergy(*audio_frame);
52 }
53 }
54
55 SourceFrame(AudioMixerImpl::SourceStatus* source_status,
56 AudioFrame* audio_frame,
57 bool muted,
58 uint32_t energy)
59 : source_status(source_status),
60 audio_frame(audio_frame),
61 muted(muted),
62 energy(energy) {
63 RTC_DCHECK(source_status);
64 RTC_DCHECK(audio_frame);
65 }
66
67 AudioMixerImpl::SourceStatus* source_status = nullptr;
68 AudioFrame* audio_frame = nullptr;
69 bool muted = true;
70 uint32_t energy = 0;
71};
72
73// ShouldMixBefore(a, b) is used to select mixer sources.
74// Returns true if `a` is preferred over `b` as a source to be mixed.
75bool ShouldMixBefore(const SourceFrame& a, const SourceFrame& b) {
76 if (a.muted != b.muted) {
77 return b.muted;
78 }
79
80 const auto a_activity = a.audio_frame->vad_activity_;
81 const auto b_activity = b.audio_frame->vad_activity_;
82
83 if (a_activity != b_activity) {
84 return a_activity == AudioFrame::kVadActive;
85 }
86
87 return a.energy > b.energy;
88}
89
90void RampAndUpdateGain(
91 rtc::ArrayView<const SourceFrame> mixed_sources_and_frames) {
92 for (const auto& source_frame : mixed_sources_and_frames) {
93 float target_gain = source_frame.source_status->is_mixed ? 1.0f : 0.0f;
94 Ramp(source_frame.source_status->gain, target_gain,
95 source_frame.audio_frame);
96 source_frame.source_status->gain = target_gain;
97 }
98}
99
100std::vector<std::unique_ptr<AudioMixerImpl::SourceStatus>>::const_iterator
101FindSourceInList(
102 AudioMixerImpl::Source const* audio_source,
103 std::vector<std::unique_ptr<AudioMixerImpl::SourceStatus>> const*
104 audio_source_list) {
105 return std::find_if(
106 audio_source_list->begin(), audio_source_list->end(),
107 [audio_source](const std::unique_ptr<AudioMixerImpl::SourceStatus>& p) {
108 return p->audio_source == audio_source;
109 });
110}
111} // namespace
112
113struct AudioMixerImpl::HelperContainers {
114 void resize(size_t size) {
115 audio_to_mix.resize(size);
116 audio_source_mixing_data_list.resize(size);
117 ramp_list.resize(size);
118 preferred_rates.resize(size);
119 }
120
121 std::vector<AudioFrame*> audio_to_mix;
122 std::vector<SourceFrame> audio_source_mixing_data_list;
123 std::vector<SourceFrame> ramp_list;
124 std::vector<int> preferred_rates;
125};
126
127AudioMixerImpl::AudioMixerImpl(
128 std::unique_ptr<OutputRateCalculator> output_rate_calculator,
129 bool use_limiter,
130 int max_sources_to_mix)
131 : max_sources_to_mix_(max_sources_to_mix),
132 output_rate_calculator_(std::move(output_rate_calculator)),
133 audio_source_list_(),
134 helper_containers_(std::make_unique<HelperContainers>()),
135 frame_combiner_(use_limiter) {
136 RTC_CHECK_GE(max_sources_to_mix, 1) << "At least one source must be mixed";
137 audio_source_list_.reserve(max_sources_to_mix);
138 helper_containers_->resize(max_sources_to_mix);
139}
140
141AudioMixerImpl::~AudioMixerImpl() {}
142
143rtc::scoped_refptr<AudioMixerImpl> AudioMixerImpl::Create(
144 int max_sources_to_mix) {
145 return Create(std::unique_ptr<DefaultOutputRateCalculator>(
146 new DefaultOutputRateCalculator()),
147 /*use_limiter=*/true, max_sources_to_mix);
148}
149
150rtc::scoped_refptr<AudioMixerImpl> AudioMixerImpl::Create(
151 std::unique_ptr<OutputRateCalculator> output_rate_calculator,
152 bool use_limiter,
153 int max_sources_to_mix) {
154 return rtc::make_ref_counted<AudioMixerImpl>(
155 std::move(output_rate_calculator), use_limiter, max_sources_to_mix);
156}
157
158void AudioMixerImpl::Mix(size_t number_of_channels,
159 AudioFrame* audio_frame_for_mixing) {
160 RTC_DCHECK(number_of_channels >= 1);
161 MutexLock lock(&mutex_);
162
163 size_t number_of_streams = audio_source_list_.size();
164
165 std::transform(audio_source_list_.begin(), audio_source_list_.end(),
166 helper_containers_->preferred_rates.begin(),
167 [&](std::unique_ptr<SourceStatus>& a) {
168 return a->audio_source->PreferredSampleRate();
169 });
170
171 int output_frequency = output_rate_calculator_->CalculateOutputRateFromRange(
172 rtc::ArrayView<const int>(helper_containers_->preferred_rates.data(),
173 number_of_streams));
174
175 frame_combiner_.Combine(GetAudioFromSources(output_frequency),
176 number_of_channels, output_frequency,
177 number_of_streams, audio_frame_for_mixing);
178}
179
180bool AudioMixerImpl::AddSource(Source* audio_source) {
181 RTC_DCHECK(audio_source);
182 MutexLock lock(&mutex_);
183 RTC_DCHECK(FindSourceInList(audio_source, &audio_source_list_) ==
184 audio_source_list_.end())
185 << "Source already added to mixer";
186 audio_source_list_.emplace_back(new SourceStatus(audio_source, false, 0));
187 helper_containers_->resize(audio_source_list_.size());
188 return true;
189}
190
191void AudioMixerImpl::RemoveSource(Source* audio_source) {
192 RTC_DCHECK(audio_source);
193 MutexLock lock(&mutex_);
194 const auto iter = FindSourceInList(audio_source, &audio_source_list_);
195 RTC_DCHECK(iter != audio_source_list_.end()) << "Source not present in mixer";
196 audio_source_list_.erase(iter);
197}
198
199rtc::ArrayView<AudioFrame* const> AudioMixerImpl::GetAudioFromSources(
200 int output_frequency) {
201 // Get audio from the audio sources and put it in the SourceFrame vector.
202 int audio_source_mixing_data_count = 0;
203 for (auto& source_and_status : audio_source_list_) {
204 const auto audio_frame_info =
205 source_and_status->audio_source->GetAudioFrameWithInfo(
206 output_frequency, &source_and_status->audio_frame);
207
208 if (audio_frame_info == Source::AudioFrameInfo::kError) {
209 RTC_LOG_F(LS_WARNING) << "failed to GetAudioFrameWithInfo() from source";
210 continue;
211 }
212 helper_containers_
213 ->audio_source_mixing_data_list[audio_source_mixing_data_count++] =
214 SourceFrame(source_and_status.get(), &source_and_status->audio_frame,
215 audio_frame_info == Source::AudioFrameInfo::kMuted);
216 }
217 rtc::ArrayView<SourceFrame> audio_source_mixing_data_view(
218 helper_containers_->audio_source_mixing_data_list.data(),
219 audio_source_mixing_data_count);
220
221 // Sort frames by sorting function.
222 std::sort(audio_source_mixing_data_view.begin(),
223 audio_source_mixing_data_view.end(), ShouldMixBefore);
224
225 int max_audio_frame_counter = max_sources_to_mix_;
226 int ramp_list_lengh = 0;
227 int audio_to_mix_count = 0;
228 // Go through list in order and put unmuted frames in result list.
229 for (const auto& p : audio_source_mixing_data_view) {
230 // Filter muted.
231 if (p.muted) {
232 p.source_status->is_mixed = false;
233 continue;
234 }
235
236 // Add frame to result vector for mixing.
237 bool is_mixed = false;
238 if (max_audio_frame_counter > 0) {
239 --max_audio_frame_counter;
240 helper_containers_->audio_to_mix[audio_to_mix_count++] = p.audio_frame;
241 helper_containers_->ramp_list[ramp_list_lengh++] =
242 SourceFrame(p.source_status, p.audio_frame, false, -1);
243 is_mixed = true;
244 }
245 p.source_status->is_mixed = is_mixed;
246 }
247 RampAndUpdateGain(rtc::ArrayView<SourceFrame>(
248 helper_containers_->ramp_list.data(), ramp_list_lengh));
249 return rtc::ArrayView<AudioFrame* const>(
250 helper_containers_->audio_to_mix.data(), audio_to_mix_count);
251}
252
253bool AudioMixerImpl::GetAudioSourceMixabilityStatusForTest(
254 AudioMixerImpl::Source* audio_source) const {
255 MutexLock lock(&mutex_);
256
257 const auto iter = FindSourceInList(audio_source, &audio_source_list_);
258 if (iter != audio_source_list_.end()) {
259 return (*iter)->is_mixed;
260 }
261
262 RTC_LOG(LS_ERROR) << "Audio source unknown";
263 return false;
264}
265} // namespace webrtc
